sentences.sContent: She begged and pleaded with them until they finally agreed.
sentences.sCn: 她一再恳求，后来他们终于同意了。

sentences.sContent: She fought back the sudden urge to run to him and beg his forgiveness.
sentences.sCn: 她突然很想冲上去请求他原谅，但是她忍住了。

sentences.sContent: ...I beg you’re looking forward to the end of this month...

words.tran: 乞讨，乞求；行乞（beg的现在分词形式）

trans.tranOther: to ask for something in an anxious or urgent way, because you want it very much
